item.title: Reflashing Cisco Catalyst With XMODEM
item.description: One of the Cisco Catalyst 3750 I had to work on recently had it’s flash completely wiped. When this happens you can only flash the filesystem using the XMODEM serial console. This is a fairly well documented process on Windows. On Linux most of the documented ways involve switching between multiple utilities and can be tricky. I wanted to documented how I did this and possibly help other in the same situation.
